title: A non stop thrill from beginning to the end!
review: When rating horror movies, i rate it by the tension in my body. It was there the whole movie, it litterly made me sick in a good way, and there weren't even cheapy jumpscares. This movie has so much tension its unusual for a now a day horror! if you like tension and heart beating scenes, you have to watch this movie and don't believe the bad comments here!

title: tried, with almost no emotion
review: I have to say, they did good on the emotional parts of the original, but the feeling between the characters was zero
